C

camera - Variable in class display.Screen
camera keeps track of the current camera position and zoom and converts Box2D coordinates to pixel coordinates.
circleShape - Variable in class box2d.B2DBody
The CircleShape is used to setup a circle.
clearScreen() - Method in class display.Screen
This method clears the whole canvas with the primary background colour and draws the grid, info and/or marker if enabled.
clearScreen(boolean) - Method in class display.Screen
This method clears the whole canvas with the primary background colour or secondary background colour depending on the active boolean and draws the grid, info and/or marker if enabled.
clone() - Method in class box2d.B2DJoint
 
col_background - Variable in class display.Screen
col_background specifies the colour of the background / "sky".
col_backgroundInactive - Variable in class display.Screen
col_background specifies the colour of the background / "sky" when the scene (or the Test) is inactive.
coordPixelsToWorld(Vec2) - Method in class box2d.B2DCamera
Takes a pixel-coordinates point as a Vec2 vector and converts those to the correspondent Box2D-World coordinates.
coordPixelsToWorld(float, float) - Method in class box2d.B2DCamera
Takes the x and y values of the pixel-coordinates and converts those to the correspondent Box2D-World coordinates.
coordPixelsToWorld(double, double) - Method in class box2d.B2DCamera
Takes the x and y values of the pixel-coordinates and converts those to the correspondent Box2D-World coordinates.
coordWorldToPixels(Vec2) - Method in class box2d.B2DCamera
Takes a Box2D-World coordinates point as a Vec2 vector and converts those to the correspondent pixel-coordinates.
createBody(World) - Method in class box2d.B2DBody
Initialises this B2DBody with the previously set values in the given World.
